sentences.en: Huge chimneys belched forth smoke and grime.
sentences.cn: 巨大的烟囱冒出烟和灰尘。

sentences.en: Kelly got the grime off his hands before rejoining her in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 凯利擦干净手上的污垢，然后又回到厨房和她在一起。

sentences.en: Its true hues may become obscured by grime and even buildups of salt.
sentences.cn: 它的原色可能会由于尘垢甚至是盐分的积累而变模糊。
